title: Mandarin Teacher / Tutor
about_company: Xinle Learning Centre We are a learning centre which is located in Pantai Indah Kapuk. Our main objective is to give a good education to all of our students so that they can do well at school. We try our best to make our students learn smart and have fun at the same time.
